title: Geo4D: Leveraging Video Generators for Geometric 4D Scene Reconstruction
description: A method to repurpose video diffusion models for monocular 3D reconstruction of dynamic scenes.

title: DSO: Aligning 3D Generators with Simulation Feedback for Physical Soundness
description: A feed-forward approach to increase the likelihood that the 3D generator outputs stable 3D objects directly.

title: Amodal3R: Amodal 3D Reconstruction from Occluded 2D Images
description: A model for completed 3D reconstruction from partially visible inputs.

title: Puppet-Master: Scaling Interactive Video Generation as a Motion Prior for Part-Level Dynamics
description: An interactive video generative model that can serve as a motion prior for part-level dynamics.

title: Explicit Correspondence Matching for Generalizable Neural Radiance Fields
description: Employing explicit correspondence matching as a geometry prior enables NeRF to generalize across scenes.

title: Semantix: An Energy Guided Sampler for Semantic Style Transfer
description: Semantic Style Transfer that simultaneously guides both style and appearance transfer.

title: Flash3D: Feed-Forward Generalisable 3D Scene Reconstruction from a Single Image
description: A fast, super efficient, trainable on a single GPU in one day for scene 3D reconstruction from a single image.

title: One-shot Human Motion Transfer via Occlusion-Robust Flow Prediction and Neural Texturing
description: A unified framework to recover better 2D appearance and 2.5D geometry.

title: Splatt3R: Zero-shot Gaussian Splatting from Uncalibrated Image Pairs
description: A Feed-Forward model that reconstruct 3D structure and apperance with uncalibrated images.

title: A General Protocol to Probe Large Vision Models for 3D Physical Understanding
description: Probe large vision models to determine to what extent they 'understand' different physical properties in an image.

title: MVSplat360: Feed-Forward 360 Scene Synthesis from Sparse Views
description: A feed-forward approach for 360-degree scene-level novel view synthesis using only sparse observations.

title: MVSplat: Efficient 3D Gaussian Splatting from Sparse Multi-View Images
description: A feed-forward approach for efficiently predicting 3D Gaussians from sparse multi-view images in a single forward pass.

title: DragAPart: Learning a Part-Level Motion Prior for Articulated Objects
description: A physical interaction with objects in vision for part-level dragging.

title: ClusteringSDF: Self-Organized Neural Implicit Surfaces for 3D Decomposition
description: A self-organized 3D segmentation/decomposition model via neural implicit surface representation.

title: Free3D: Consistent Novel View Synthesis without 3D Representation
description: A method to synthesize consistent novel views from a single image on open-set categories without the need of explicit 3D representations.

title: Amodal Ground Truth and Completion in the Wild
description: Setting up a Stable Diffusion based network to solve the amodal completion problem for any category and without occluder mask provided.

title: A Versatile Plug-and-Play Module for Rectifying Diffusion Schedule Flaws and Enhancing Low-Frequency Controls
description: A versatile plug-and-play module to fix the scheduler flaws for diffusion models.

title: PanoDiffusion: 360-degree Panorama Outpainting via Diffusion
description: An indoor panorama outpainting model using latent diffusion models with view-consistent.

title: Bridging Global Context Interactions for High-Fidelity Pluralistic Image Completion
description: PICFormer achieves pluralistic image completion with multiple and diverse solutions using a transformer based architecture.

title: Cocktail🍸: Mixing Multi-Modality Controls for Text-Conditional Image Generation
description: A generalized framework for multi-modality control based on text-to-image generation.

title: Online clustered codebook
description: A simple approach to avoid codebook collapse and achive 100% codebook utilisation.

title: Vector Quantized Wasserstein Auto-Encoder
description: Minimize the codebook-data distortion as the Wasserstein distance.

title: UniD3: Unified Discrete Diffusion for Simultaneous Vision-Language Generation
description: A unified discrete diffusion model for simultaneous vision-language generation.

title: MoVQ: Modulating Quantized Vectors for High-Fidelity Image Generation
description: A spatially conditional normalization is introduced to address the repeated artifacts in vector quantized methods.

title: Object-Compositional Neural Implicit Surfaces
description: Automatically decompose a scene into 3D instance, trained using only 2D semantic lables and images.

title: Sem2NeRF: Converting Single-View Semantic Masks to Neural Radiance Fields
description: A model that transfers the 2D semantic map into 3D NeRF, and lets users edit 3D model through 2D semantic input.

title: Bridging global context interactions for high-fidelity image completion
description: TFill fills in reasonable contents for both foreground object removal and content completion.

title: Visiting the Invisible: Layer-by-Layer Completed Scene Decomposition
description: A high-level scene understanding system that simultaneously models the completed shape and appearance for all instances.

title: AgileGAN: Stylizing Portraits by Inversion-Consistent Transfer Learning
description: A GAN inversion model is trained for Stylizing Portraits.

title: The Spatially-Correlative Loss for Various Image Translation Tasks
description: A novel spatially-correlative loss that is simple, efficient and yet effective for preserving scene structure consistency while supporting large appearance changes during unpaired I2I translation.

title: Pluralistic (Free-Form) Image Completion
description: Given a masked image, the proposed pic model is able to generate multiple and diverse plausible results.

title: T2Net: Synthetic-to-Realistic Translation for Depth Estimation Tasks
description: Without using any real depth map, the proposed model evaluates depth maps on real scenes using only synthetic datasets.
